titleStmt.title: De consolatione, Anglo-Latine expressus per S.E.M.
De consolatione philosophiae
titleStmt.author: Boethius, d. 524.
Bertius, Petrus, 1565-1629.
Rota, Julianus Martianus.
Spencer, Edward, Sir, 1595-1656.

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
Attributed to Boethius. cf. NUC pre-1956.
The dedication is subscribed S.E.M. who is identified with Sir E. Spencer by Walter E. Houghton, Jr. (The Review of English Studies, v. VIII, no. 26, April 1931).
"The life and death of Anicius Manlius Torquatus Severinus Boethius. Taken out of Peter Bertius and Jul. Martianus Rota": pp. 57-75.
